value.title: StarCraft 2 - REYNOR'S PURE ZERGLING ZvT (on his troll account!)
value.excerpt: Reynor OP, clearly. Has an alt account that is still at 7K MMR wtf! The rest of us wish we can use zerglings with half the success he does. value.title: StarCraft 2: EPIC Games on Moondance - The BEST New Map?
value.excerpt: In this video I casted two professional games of StarCraft 2 on Moondance. Moondance is a map with a lot of bases but a short rush distance. A pocket third offers players a safe expansion but it has less mineral nodes than a regular base and only one gas geyser. This map is made by Marras, who also created

value.excerpt: StarCraft 2 Battle Royale 6-man free-for-all between Maru, SuperNova, Taeja, Stats, Patience and Ragnarok.
